response.overview: Yorkshire’s most successful two-piece electronic keyboard group, The Brett Domino Trio, make their big screen debut with a feature-length compilation of music, entertainment and documentary footage from their 15-year “career”.  Whether you’ve been following the band from the start, or you know them from their appearances on Channel 4’s ‘8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown’ - or you’ve never heard of them before in your life and you’re just reading about them for the first time now - get ready to have your mind blown by colossal keytar solos, epic power ballads, fascinating songwriting insights, and a captivating glimpse behind the scenes with Brett Domino and Steven Peavis.  Expect remastered favourites, unreleased music, and brand new specially-filmed segments.
response.title: Brettrospective
